mapper.select: SELECT o.id, o.schedule_id AS scheduleId, m.title AS movieTitle, h.name AS hallName, sc.start_time AS startTime, GROUP_CONCAT(CONCAT(se.row, '排', se.col, '座')) AS seatNumbers, o.status, o.created_at AS createdAt FROM `order` o JOIN schedule sc ON o.schedule_id = sc.id JOIN movie m ON sc.movie_id = m.id JOIN hall h ON sc.hall_id = h.id JOIN seat_status se ON se.order_id = o.id WHERE o.user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY o.id ORDER BY o.created_at DESC
